Package controller

Class MarketController

java.lang.Object
controller.MarketController
public class MarketController
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MarketController​(FrontController frontController, ArtManager artLibrary, WalletManager walletLibrary)
    This controller pertains to running the Market functions that allow players to trade with each other

  • Constructor Details

    • MarketController

      public MarketController​(FrontController frontController, ArtManager artLibrary, WalletManager walletLibrary)
      This controller pertains to running the Market functions that allow players to trade with each other
      Parameters:
      frontController - the FrontController used by this class
      artLibrary - the ArtLibrary used by this class
      walletLibrary - the WalletManager used by this class (not PublicWalletRegistry)

  • Method Details

    • viewMerchandise

      public void viewMerchandise()
      Dispatches a request to present market actions to the user

    • getAllMerchandiseOnMarket

      public java.util.List<Merchandise> getAllMerchandiseOnMarket()
      Gets a list of all merchandise on this market
      Returns:
      a List of Merchandise objects

    • postMerchandise

      public void postMerchandise​(java.util.UUID artId)
      Adds a piece of Merchandise to the market
      Parameters:
      artId - the UUID of the art object to be posted to the market

    • makeTradeWithWallet

      public void makeTradeWithWallet​(java.util.UUID wantedItemId, java.util.UUID selectedWalletId)
      Makes a trade using a wallet
      Parameters:
      wantedItemId - the UUID of the wanted item
      selectedWalletId - the UUID of the wallet

    • makeArtForArtTrade

      public void makeArtForArtTrade​(java.util.UUID artOnMarketId, java.util.UUID artInWalletId)
      Makes an art for art trade
      Parameters:
      artOnMarketId - the UUID of the art on the listings
      artInWalletId - the UUID of the art in the wallet
